Name: The Slaughter: Magdalene
About the game: Canning Town, 1880. A narrowboat sits, bound to the bank of the Thames. Inside, a painter stands at their easel, composing the figure of Mary Magdalene. The Slaughter: Magdalene is a short interlude from the world of The Slaughter, with a play time of approximately five minutes. Enjoy a relaxing painting game, while a gentle score plays. /
